item.title: Mudslides trap drivers, bury roads and damage homes in southern California
item.description: Flooding and mudslides have buried roads, damaged homes and trapped drivers in several southern California communities

item.title: A brutal beating by deputies was caught on tape. They were cleared anyway
item.description: Never-before-seen footage shows two Louisiana deputies punching an inmate more than 50 times during a jailhouse strip-search in 2019

item.title: Muhammad Ali's unsigned draft card, a piece of Vietnam-era history, will be auctioned
item.description: Muhammad Aliâ€™s refusal to sign his military draft card upended his life and added a powerful voice to the anti-war movement

item.title: Woman's remains in Oregon identified 49 years later
item.description: Oregon authorities say DNA has helped identify a woman's remains after 49 years

item.title: Assault charges dismissed against NYC man who said he was beaten by Egyptian officials
item.description: Prosecutors have dropped assault charges against a New York man who claimed Egyptian officials dragged him off a Manhattan street and beat him
